data.actual_result: The roles modal briefly flashes with out of place items before minimizing back to normal.
data.expected_result: The roles modal will be normal.
data.short_description: Opening the roles modal repeatedly results in a glitched interface
data.steps_to_repro: - View a guild's online list with at least 1,000 users. - Select each user down the list at a steady pace. - Continue step 2 until results are produced
